id.description: The unique identifier of the address entry

address1.description: The first line of the customer's address

address2.description: The second line of the customer's address

cart_note.description: Any notes related to the cart or order

city.description: The city where the customer resides

company.description: The company name associated with the address

country.description: The country where the customer resides

customer_id.description: The unique identifier of the customer

created_at.description: The date and time when the address was created

discount_id.description: The identifier of any discount applied to the address

first_name.description: The first name of the customer

last_name.description: The last name of the customer

note_attributes.description: Any additional notes or attributes related to the address

phone.description: The phone number associated with the address

province.description: The state or province of the address

shipping_lines_override.description: Overrides for shipping lines related to the address

updated_at.description: The date and time when the address was last updated

zip.description: The postal or zip code of the address
